Transparency.help: This power makes the Giant Monster more transparent.

Cairn.help: Devoured Rock Beasts can plant a Cairn.
Cairn.targetHelp: Devoured Rock Beasts can plant a Cairn.

Rubble.help: When the Rockbeast falls, he crumbles and may form into several smaller versions of himself.
Rubble.targetHelp: When the Rockbeast falls, he crumbles and may form into several smaller versions of himself.

Super_Jump.help: While this power is active, you can leap great distances and heights, easily jumping over buildings and from rooftop to rooftop! If you attack a target while this power is on, you will temporarily be reduced to a normal jump height. You must be at least level 14 and have Jump Kick or Combat Jumping before selecting Super Jump.

Flurry.help: Unleashes a super fast Flurry of punches to pummel your foe. Flurry is so dizzying that it has a chance to Disorient the target.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Hasten.help: You can reduce the recharge time of all powers for 2 minutes. Although Hasten does not cost any Endurance to activate, you can tire easily since your Endurance does not recover more rapidly. After Hasten wears off, you become tired and will lose some Endurance.
Hasten.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

messages.victimHit: Your {PowerName} drains {Damage} points of endurance.

Super_Speed.help: You can run at super-human speeds! While running at such speeds, you are a blur, and many foes will not even notice you as you speed past them. If you attack a target while this power is on, you will temporarily be slowed to normal speed. You must be at least level 14 and have Flurry or Hasten before selecting Super Speed.

Whirlwind.help: You spin around at an amazing speed to create a Whirlwind around yourself. Any foes that enter this Whirlwind will be tossed into the air. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Speed Powers before selecting Whirlwind.
Whirlwind.attackerHit: You spin into a {PowerName}, and can now toss your foes in the air like the garbage they are.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
Your {PowerName} drains {Damage} points of endurance.

Recall_Friend.help: You can Teleport one of your teammates to yourself. The target must be a teammate and can be selected from the Team Window. You can also rescue a fallen teammate who may be in a hostile location, as long as he is on the same map. Range is not infinite, but extremely long and can be enhanced. This power can be interrupted.
Recall_Friend.confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Teleport you. Do you Accept?

Teleport_Foe.help: You can Teleport a single foe directly next to yourself. A successful hit must be made in order to Teleport the target, and some powerful foes cannot be Teleported. This power can be interrupted.

Teleport.help: You can Teleport long distances. Teleport has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance. You must be at least level 14 and have Recall Friend or Teleport Foe before selecting Teleport.

Team_Teleport.help: You can Teleport yourself and your nearby teammates to a targeted location. Teammates must be in close proximity to you. Team Teleport costs slightly more Endurance than Teleport, but you can Teleport your entire team for no additional cost. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Teleportation Powers before selecting Team Teleport.

Spectral_Chill.help: The Ghost Ship has passed through you. You felt its Spectral Chill in your bones. Your Accuracy and Damage has been greatly reduced.
Spectral_Chill.targetHelp: The Ghost Ship has passed through you. You felt its Spectral Chill in your bones. Your Accuracy and Damage has been greatly reduced.
Spectral_Chill.victimHit: The Ghost Ship has reduced your Accuracy and Damage just by passing through you.

Ethereal.help: Ghosts can make themselves Ethereal and shift out of the material plane. Ethereal Spectres are invisible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space.
Ethereal.targetHelp: Ghosts can make themselves Ethereal and shift out of the material plane. Ethereal Spectres are invisible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space.

messages.attackerHit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Resistance.targetShortHelp: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Immobilize, Slow

Necroplasmic_Grasp.help: The Ghost has enveloped you in it's Necroplasmic Grasp. You are Held as your life is drained.

Positioning.help: Bright Novas prefer to attack from the air, and will flee if attacked in melee.

Resistance.help: Hydra Head cannot be moved. It is resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear, Confuse, Teleport and psionic and all damage. The Hydra Head can only be defeated with the Rikti Beam cannon.

Energy_Absorption.help: Activating this power draws moisture directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw moisture from adds to your own Endurance as well as Defense to all attacks except psionics. The first foe you absorb grants the highest Defense bonus, and you can absorb up to 10 foes. In addition to Defense, Energy Absorption also grants you resistance to Slow effects. If there are no foes within range, this power will fail. Recharge: Long
Energy_Absorption.shortHelp: PBAoE, Self +End, +DEF(All but Psionics), Res (Slow), Foe -End

One_with_Winter.help: You can Phase Shift to become out of sync with normal space. Although you do not become completely Invisible, you are translucent and hard to see. You are intangible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space.

Dull_Pain.targetHelp: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Dull_Pain.attackerHit: You {PowerName} and increase your maximum Hit Points.

Unyielding.help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient effects, and all damage except Psionics, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
Unyielding.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, All DMG but Psionics), Self -DEF
Unyielding.targetHelp: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient effects, and all damage except Psionics, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
Unyielding.targetShortHelp: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, All DMG but Psionics), Self -DEF
Unyielding.attackerHit: You now resist Damage, Knockback and Disorientation with your {PowerName}, but cannot move.

Invincibility.help: While this power is active, for each foe in melee range you receive a bonus to Defense against all melee attacks, some Defense to Ranged attacks, and a bonus to your Accuracy. This power is most effective while fighting multiple opponents. Invincibility is ineffective if you are battling foes at a range. Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.

Unstoppable.help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.shortHelp: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.targetHelp: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.targetShortHelp: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

Reconstruction.help: The Vampire can concentrate for a few moments to heal himself.

Claw_Swipe.help: Werewolf claw attacks cover a wide cone and can knockdown its foes.

Resistance.help: Werewolves are highly resistant to all damage and Immobilization.

Winter_Storm.help: The Winter Storm significantly reduces your resistance to cold damage.

Resistance.help: Zombie are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Slow and Disorient. They are also resistant to Cold, Negative Energy and Psionic damage, but vulnerable to energy, fire and lethal damage.
